about_the_game:
In dashton+ you control a bird dashing through the desert popping balloons while dodging foes. Play alone or up to four players at once with full controller support along with wearing varies hats.

This is a complete rewrite of the original dashton title with additional features and content, all while still having the classic arcade gameplay.

Features
  • Rebuilt from scratch with the latest tech
  • Uniquely different hats to choose from
  • Up to four players can play at once
  • Support for Xbox, PlayStation, and Switch controllers without any additional software
  • Variable refresh rate supported (60hrtz, 90hrtz, 120hrtz, 240hrtz, etc.)
detailed_description:
In dashton+ you control a bird dashing through the desert popping balloons while dodging foes. Play alone or up to four players at once with full controller support along with wearing varies hats.

This is a complete rewrite of the original dashton title with additional features and content, all while still having the classic arcade gameplay.

Features
  • Rebuilt from scratch with the latest tech
  • Uniquely different hats to choose from
  • Up to four players can play at once
  • Support for Xbox, PlayStation, and Switch controllers without any additional software
  • Variable refresh rate supported (60hrtz, 90hrtz, 120hrtz, 240hrtz, etc.)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.28+, 64-bit only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.4 and newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)

name: dashton+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D 11 support (feature level 10_0)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Graphics: Vulkan support

short_description: Dash through the desert dodging foes and popping balloon, wearing stylish hats alone or with up to four players.
